### Good Pipeline Characteristics:

| Feature | Benefit |
|---------|--------|
| Idempotent | Safe to rerun |
| Modular | Easy to maintain |
| Observable | Easy to debug |
| Tested | Reliable |

### Orchestration:

**Definition:** Coordinate pipeline execution.

| Tool | Characteristics |
|------|----------------|
| Airflow | Python DAGs |
| Prefect | Modern Python |
| Dagster | Asset-based |

### Monitoring Metrics:

| Metric | Purpose |
|--------|--------|
| Run status | Success/failure |
| Duration | Performance |
| Data volume | Completeness |
| Freshness | Timeliness |

### Error Strategies:

| Strategy | When |
|----------|------|
| Retry | Transient errors |
| Skip | Non-critical |
| Alert | Needs attention |
| Fail | Critical error |

### Data Lineage:

**Definition:** Track data origin and transformations.

### Benefits:
| Benefit | Value |
|---------|------|
| Impact analysis | What breaks if X changes |
| Debugging | Trace issues |
| Compliance | Audit trail |

### Comparison:

| Aspect | Batch | Streaming |
|--------|-------|----------|
| Latency | Hours/minutes | Seconds |
| Complexity | Lower | Higher |
| Cost | Lower | Higher |
| Use case | Reports | Real-time |
